Title: Sperks Menu
Description:
Sperks was being designed to be a multiplayer top down shooter game with mulitplayer functionality similar to Halo. I designed and implemented the menu, it had a glossy motiff with sleek and smooth curves. Very little of the game's logic was implemented, but the main menu was designed & implemented.
The menu was designed using Adobe Photoshop & implemented using XNA/C#/Visual Studio Community Edition

Title: SMW Map Studio
Description:
The Super Mario War Map Studio was a simple application that allowed the user to create custom maps for the game "Super Mario War". It read in the map files using the games native file format, it displayed the map using the game's tileset, & allowed the user to modify it, & save.
The insight into the way the .map files were structured later allowed for my work for www.smwstuff.com.
The application was built in Visual Studio Community Edition using C# & .NET Framework Windows Forms. The application is no longer availabe.

Title: SMW Stuff
Description: SMW Stuff (www.smwstuff.com) was a website written as a community repository for smw content. This included map files, custom skins, mods, etc. The website was written using PHP, mySQL, and was hosted on a Linux/Apache server. I worked with community leaders within the SMW community to build the website. They provided & maintained the server and I programmed the website. I also designed the website using simple html/css tools.
